page.title: 02LLANBISTER EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Of the total population 81 are native, 42 are incomers. n and i in the following summary. 36n, 18i male: 31n, 16i female: 9n, 4i male under 18: 5n, 4i female under 18:
EMPLOYMENT:
16n 9i housewives: 17n farmers 1n forestry: 2n farm contractor 1n 2i builders: 2i village stores 5n 1i from home 1n caravan site 6n 4i children 1i stonemason 7n 7i retired 2i artists 3n Powys C.C. 1n C.P. school 1n widow 1i weaver 2i timber contractors 1i single parent 13n 4i student or employed part time 7n 6i employed outside area, 10 miles
